description: Updates the content of an approval rule template. You can change the number of required approvals, the membership of the approval rule, and whether an approval pool is defined.

parameters.name: approvalRuleTemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the approval rule template where you want to update the content of the rule.

parameters.name: newRuleContent
parameters.description: The content that replaces the existing content of the rule. Content statements must be complete. You cannot provide only the changes.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleTemplate
nested_items.description: Returns information about an approval rule template.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleTemplateId
nested_items.description: The system-generated ID of the approval rule template.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleTemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the approval rule template.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleTemplateDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the approval rule template.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleTemplateContent
nested_items.description: The content of the approval rule template.

nested_items.name: ruleContentSha256
nested_items.description: The SHA-256 hash signature for the content of the approval rule template.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date the approval rule template was most recently changed, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date the approval rule template was created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedUser
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who made the most recent changes to the approval rule template.
